title: Moto9999
author: Moto9999
content: I need verification for a particular prize unfortunately for me I don't have my verification details and it's for a large sum of money and I need selfie with id, driver license both sides,or passport proof of address, proof of income also add your btc address so I can send you btc when I claim it

comments.author: HedgeFx
comments.body: Quote from: Moto9999 on March 30, 2023, 11:49:08 AMI need verification for a particular prize unfortunately for me I don't have my verification details and it's for a large sum of money and I need selfie with id, driver license both sides,or passport proof of address, proof of income also add your btc address so I can send you btc when I claim itLoL   You think people are so stupid to send you their ID with selfie ? Why you don't get a job intead of trying to scam people? EDIT: Anyone will send him any documents or selfie with ID , will get scammed (or wil get police at home at 6 am asking to open door!)
